information.name: kmz-map
information.description: A UCRM plugin that provides a frontend Google Map for clients to view tower coverage.
information.author: Charuwts, LLC

configuration.label: Form Description
configuration.description: Displayed below logo before the form. (Can contain HTML)

configuration.label: Link 1
configuration.description: Display a button on the left. Syntax is title|link Example: Signup Now! | https://www.charuwts.com/plugins

configuration.label: Link Two
configuration.description: Display a button on the right. Syntax is title|link Example: Request for your area! | https://www.charuwts.com/contact
